location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, enclosing a letter received from the Secretary Military Board on 6 April 1814, containing an invoice of military stores, transmitted on board the Ernaad,Captain H. Hardy, to the Residency at Bushire, for the purpose of being forwarded to the King of Persia.
